author: Will Jones
description:
Nigel Farage today told US lawmakers in Washington that the UK is in an "awful, authoritarian position" and resembles North Korea as he highlighted the appalling treatment of Graham Linehan and Lucy Connolly.

The post “At What Point Did We Become North Korea?” Nigel Farage Tells US Lawmakers in Washington About Starmer’s “Awful and Authoritarian” UK appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: “At What Point Did We Become North Korea?” Nigel Farage Tells US Lawmakers in Washington About Starmer’s “Awful and Authoritarian” UK

author: Sallust
description:
A round-the-world motorcyclist has had his wheels and his equipment and possessions stolen in Nottingham, after having already travelled through 17 countries on his way from Mumbai to Cape Town via London.

The post Round-The-World Motorcyclist Has His Bike Stolen in Nottingham appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Round-The-World Motorcyclist Has His Bike Stolen in Nottingham

author: Will Jones
description:
Graham Linehan has said he will sue the Metropolitan Police for wrongful arrest and a breach of his free speech rights as Met Commissioner Mark Rowley says officers should not get involved in "toxic culture wars".

The post Graham Linehan to Sue Metropolitan Police for Wrongful Arrest appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Graham Linehan to Sue Metropolitan Police for Wrongful Arrest

author: Will Jones
description:
Angela Rayner is fighting for her political future as Kemi Badenoch demands Keir Starmer sack her after she referred herself to the ethics adviser following an admission that she did not pay enough tax on her second home.

The post Rayner Must Be Sacked After Admitting Underpaying Tax on Second Home, Demands Badenoch appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Rayner Must Be Sacked After Admitting Underpaying Tax on Second Home, Demands Badenoch

author: Michael Rainsborough
description:
Britain's descent towards civil war is no accident, says Professor Michael Rainsborough. Decades of 'divide and rule' policies from the radical Leftists who have colonised our institutions were revolutionary by intent.

The post Britain’s Descent Towards Civil War is No Accident appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Britain’s Descent Towards Civil War is No Accident

author: Will Jones
description:
The Labour Government's popularity crashed to a new record low of minus-59 yesterday as markets ramped up borrowing costs following Starmer's side-lining of Reeves and drafting in of hard Left economic advisers.

The post Labour Government’s Popularity Crashes to New Record Low as Markets Ramp Up Borrowing Costs appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour Government’s Popularity Crashes to New Record Low as Markets Ramp Up Borrowing Costs

author: Tilak Doshi
description:
German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has warned that the welfare state is "no longer sustainable" while France and the UK teeter on the brink. Europe is doubling down on the economic suicide of Net Zero, says Dr Tilak Doshi.

The post The End of Europe’s Welfare State: Net Zero, Debt and Decline appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The End of Europe’s Welfare State: Net Zero, Debt and Decline
